website_summaries.verdict: These warp-resistant pans do the job but require some babying for the results.
pros: Heavy-duty steel rolled-rim bakeware construction for warp resistance
Wash in dishwasher unless you use tablet detergent
Nonstick coating works in some cases
cons: Hand-wash and dry soon for best results

customer_reviews.title: I originally gave this 5 stars because I really liked the smooth finish that whatever I made did not ...
customer_reviews.text: I originally gave this 5 stars because I really liked the smooth finish that whatever I made did not stick to. But now it's about 9 months later, and the finish is flaking off the pans even though I don't use them all that often, maybe every 2 weeks or so. I have been careful to use non-metal or scratching utensils too, but the finish is flaking off and the metal underneath is rusting. Terrible for pans less than a year old!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Important Note to Baker's About These Pans
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pans to replace some old Bake King pans. It is important to note that a 9x5 pan made in the USA is 5 inches from edge to edge (3.5 to 4 inches on the bottom) and 9 inches long on the top, about 7.5 on the bottom. These pans made in China are a full 6 inches wide, edge to edge, and 4.5 inches wide on the bottom. Length is a full inch longer. If you are used to making bread or loaf cakes in a USA made 9x5, these will result in lower than usual rise as a result of the extra width and length.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Oh. My. Goodness.  Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: These pans bake great bread! Following the mfr's instructions not to use non-stick spray, I greased the pans with Crisco but I probably didn't need to; the loaves popped right out when I turned the pans over. The pans spent 50 minutes in the oven at 400 degrees several times today and did not warp or discolor. They looked perfectly clean after use, but I washed them out anyway after the last batch of bread. These bake more evenly than my expensive loaf pans, and if I have to replace them every year they will still be a bargain! [Not a paid review; I bought these pans.]
customer_reviews.author: evl

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the old ones
customer_reviews.text: Two stars for holding dough/batter and holding up in the oven. Missing the other stars because it looks and feels like a cheap knockoff of my older Farberware bread pan. My old pan will be holding loaves of bread after I die but this new one will be in the recycle bin in less than a decade.
customer_reviews.author: Matt V.

customer_reviews.title: Quality bread pan
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent non-stick surface, durable, even heating, easy release. Cons: Slightly heavy, can be scratched with metal utensils. So far everything that I have cooked in these, banana bread, apple bread, regular bread, etc. has turned out good. Best of all when they are done you can simply tip the pan over and it will fall right out. No need to "loosen" the sides. They are heavy enough to give even heating yet not too heavy that you want to avoid using them. I bought one first to test and ended up buying 3 more are now they are the only ones I use (except I did keep one Pyrex because who doesn't have at least one Pyrex bread pan).
customer_reviews.author: Tiger88

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I use them for baking banana bread and it always comes out perfect. They are also easy to clean. For anyone who experiences your cakes or bread sticking, try coating the inside of the pans with butter and then some light coating of all purpose flour before you add your batter. You can also put parchment paper inside before adding the batter. Works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Tineo-Perez

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and nonstick
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make pumpkin bread with my mom. When we got ready to pour the dough into the pans, she was apprehensive that I didn’t want to use PAM or other cooking spray as per the instructions that came with the pan. I convinced her just to let me try it. Those loaves of bread slid out like butter! Wonderful nonstick finish, beautiful design, sturdy quality, and an unbeatable price. If you need bread pans, look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: No complaints here - solid pans
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for making sandwich loaves and appreciate the slightly larger size (about 20% bigger by volume by my rough measurement). This makes for a better-sized slice than my standard pan. The nonstick functionality is great. Bread almost hops out of there when it's done. You really can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: AlBSure

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: We are still after over 6 years using these same pans to bake all kinds of things, mostly bread and they still are in perfect baking condition. They bake evenly.
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: consequently easy to clean and maintain in top condition
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, have used them several times. My satisfaction level way higher than expected: truly non-stick (best when used with a wiped on light layer of cooking oil, although I think even that is not necessary when the pans are still new), consequently easy to clean and maintain in top condition. I just wipe with a soft clean cloth or paper towel after each use. Love them! Will buy at least one or two more, since some of my baking needs 3 at once. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Peide Xie

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: Work great. When they arrived I made a couple loafs of cream cheese banana nut bread. I used no spray or grease on the pans. Loafs fell right out. Pans washed up easily in plain water. Ready to use again.
customer_reviews.author: Next_Level_2x

customer_reviews.title: Made a delicious meatloaf with this pan
customer_reviews.text: I never cooked a meatloaf before, but since I need to work ar home, I decided I could prep everything during my lunch break and cook it in the oven before dinner. This was a meal I missed and this pan helped me cook it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Good light color
customer_reviews.text: The ones I got in the two pack were nice and light which means quick breads won't be overly brown. They are a decent weight and heat evenly. I have only used twice so can't comment about longevity but the bread just popped right out when I inverted the pan and they were easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sandal

customer_reviews.title: Great bread results and no stciking
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these pans to make triple batches of my rye bread. The rye dough I'm using is pretty wet and sticky as hell. With some other bread pans I had sticking problems both during the final rising of the dough in the pan as well as in getting the bread out of the pan after baking. With these pans I have no such problems - the rising dough doesn't stick at all to the pan, and the baked loafs easily slide out (straight from the oven, without cooling). My mother-in-law even commented that she was sure I had already washed the pans, they were that clean after sliding the loafs out.
customer_reviews.author: Eli

customer_reviews.title: Even Steven
customer_reviews.text: They baked my banana bread to perfection. Cleanup was a breeze and these are heavy duty and affordable. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: djdandylion

customer_reviews.title: Great baking pans
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome pans for those of us who bake bread from scratch -- the dough doesn't stick, loaves slip out easily after baking, and they are a cinch to clean up. Plus the handles at each end are helpful bringing the loaves out of a hot oven. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: maidindetroit

customer_reviews.title: It's a good starter loaf pan
customer_reviews.text: It's a good starter loaf pan. These pans browns well. I am glad that I purchase this. I felt the price was more than fair. I owned these for about a year; the major drawback is that they stain. Residue will stay on the pans. I have tried baking soda and and metal cleaners nothing will get the finish back to where it was. The finish becomes porous and the loaf will stick. Parchment paper helps a great deal. After a year of the Farware I purchased the Nordic Ware Loaf Pans. Those are the best pans I have used.
customer_reviews.author: R. Cordero

customer_reviews.title: A great loaf tin
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan very much and am about to buy a second one. It's beautifully non-stick (granted, I always spray it first , but we all know that's not always good enough with many pans), ensures even baking, and is a breeze to clean. Like with all my bakeware, I wash it by hand (seriously, it is ridiculously easy to wash) and immediately dry with paper towels -- I find that this way, I never encounter any rust or peeling problems. Edited to add: I did buy a second one, and I'm still really happy with my purchase(s)
customer_reviews.author: brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Great Bread Baking
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy & will last forever. But, even though the instructions said to not use a non sticking spray on them, my first attempt of baking in them one of them stuck to the pan. From now on, I will use a spray!
customer_reviews.author: MiMi 2 three

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bread Pan
customer_reviews.text: I just got this and decided to try it out right away. After I shaped and placed the dough, I realized I forgot to grease the pan. Well, when they say "nonstick," they really mean it, because the loaf fell right out when I tipped it. Wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Holly R.

customer_reviews.title: This is the best non-stick loaf pan I have owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the best non-stick loaf pan I have owned. This replaced a Caphalon nonstick loaf pan that was 3 times more expensive. It's nonstick properties did not last. I baked 2 loaves of bread when I first got the Farberware loaf pan - one in the Farberware and one in the Caphalon. I generously oiled both. The loaf in the Farberware pan feel right out. The loaf in the Caphalon stuck, big time. I threw the Caphalon away and will be buying another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G

customer_reviews.title: Solid Pans with Great Coating!
customer_reviews.text: These were easy to use and easy to clean thanks to the super-smooth coating of the metal. I'd buy them again, but I likely won't need replacements for at least a decade. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Royer

customer_reviews.title: Why didn’t I buy these sooner ?
customer_reviews.text: After years of using my hand me down tag sale pans I finally bought these - and dear lord - why did I wait so long??? These are FABULOUS! Bread slips right out without even greasing the pan
customer_reviews.author: sage crary

customer_reviews.title: I love this loaf pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this loaf pan. I spray with non-stick cooking spray before pouring my bread or cake batter into the pan. Everything slides out with ease. So easy to clean. Food bakes evenly. Would recommend this pan to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: krissyt17

customer_reviews.title: bread slides right out
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a couple times since buying it and I don't use any cooking spray and the bread just slides out which in turn makes clean up a breeze. These have worked very well for me
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, sturdy, non-stick pan
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, sturdy, standard sized loaf pan 9" x 5", about 2.5" high. It was clearly made to last. I already had a loaf pan but needed two more before the holidays, so I could bake bread and cakes in larger quantities. I ordered these pans and they arrived in a day, in perfect condition. They were stacked into each other for shipping, which makes me think that scratching off the coating is probably not a concern for these and I will store them the same way.They are non-stick and their handle helps with holding the hot pan. My other loaf pan does not have that handle and it's much harder to take out of the oven when it's hot.
customer_reviews.author: Nanda Dyssou

customer_reviews.title: Nice pan
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality, nicely finished, very good non-stick..what else do you need? It's a loaf pan and it's made by Farberware: it's just a good, plain old loaf pan...buy it and make some bread already!
customer_reviews.author: thedanester

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Made my first loaf of bread with one of these. Easy to clean and non-stick. Sturdier than I expected, all in all I'm very pleased with these bread pans!
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Only got to use it once before it rusted
customer_reviews.text: Only got to use it once in the 38 days I've owned it. Used it, and discovered today when going to put it away that it rusted around one edge of the lip, and it's just after the return period, so it's basically garbage to me at this point. Thankfully, it wasn't expensive (so I can swallow the minimal cost), but I'll be getting a ceramic loaf pan to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pans
customer_reviews.text: I made pumpkin bread in these pans. They are a good thickness. Baked evenly. Bread came out easily, did not stick. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: K. Raider

customer_reviews.title: Farberware loaf pans
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful loaf pans. I will use them to bake some nice loaves of bread.
customer_reviews.author: Pat K.

customer_reviews.title: good call. The breads just slip right out
customer_reviews.text: Started making my own bread, bought two of these. The first time I used them, I greased them just in case. But seeing the way water just slid right off, I decided to risk it and go grease-less. Wow, good call. The breads just slip right out, zero sticking. You could just flip the pan over and they'd fall right out. On top of that, they bake nice and even.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice loaf pans
customer_reviews.text: Faberware loaf pans are great. The quality is good, especially for the budget minded. The inside is smooth for easy cleaning, no creases or join points. Although they are non stick I still use spray or butter, but even the stickiest caramel loaf falls out easily. The nonstick coating hasn't show any signs of peeling off. the handles on the ends make it easy to get the pans in and out of the oven. The measure is accurate, they are 9x5. These aren't heavy but they aren't super thin and flimsy either. A really nice loaf pan
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent pan at an excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These pans are sturdy, which I like. I bake bake bread and these pans did not disappoint. I actually ordered another set because I was so pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Is as described
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. No Complaints here. Study and thick, what you'd expect like old school and still light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and indeed non stick
customer_reviews.text: Made banana bread in it the other day and the cleanup was super easy. Hated in the past how crumbs would stick onto the cheaper thinner pans but these are sturdier (doesn't warp in oven) and the lighter color means they won't overbrown in the oven. Happy with this and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: We used these bread pans a lot esp during quarantine! We’ve made banana and zucchini bread, all turned out great. Pans are sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.author: Annita

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: I have used these a few times now, and they are nice and heavy, but not too heavy. Stuff just falls out of them.
customer_reviews.author: ociana

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These pans are well made and easy to clean...if you remember to grease the pan before baking the bread. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: EK

customer_reviews.title: Don't have these?  Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! My old loaf pans were so old and were not nonstick. These loaf pans are heavy, nonstick, and a real treat to work with! Used them both yesterday for baking lemon poppy seed pound cake & absolutely loved them! If you like loaf pans, you'll absolutely love these! Not a crumb stuck on the sides; used parchment paper in the bottom. I'll definitely order more! Much obliged for such a wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Lyne R. Charlsen

customer_reviews.title: good name brand pans
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice replacement to my old beat up pans, good price for abrand name.
customer_reviews.author: yw

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic pan for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this loaf pan to replace my old one, which was also made by a leading manufacturer. This one is superior in every way. First, it's a TRUE 9"x5". As such, it's nearly a quarter inch larger than its predecessor both ways. It also has a nice heft to it; it should withstand heavy use without any issues. The lip "handles" on the ends are slightly oversized to accommodate oven mitts comfortably. I'll be buying another one so I can have separate pans for meat and bread.
customer_reviews.author: Pete T.

customer_reviews.title: Not 9x5 but works
customer_reviews.text: Work good but NOT 9x5 like it says. About 9.5 x 6. Not the end of the world but figured it's good to know
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Baking during lock down
customer_reviews.text: Had no loaf pans, now I can cook a bunch of banana bread...or bread...or meatloaf...or....
customer_reviews.author: JJVA

customer_reviews.title: Was great because I was right in the middle of making ...
customer_reviews.text: Price on point and received sooner than anticipated. Was great because I was right in the middle of making bread and was wondering what am I going to put the 2nd load in and Shazam, knock on my door and pan arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellente
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic buy. Only used them once thus far but these pans have lived up to there billing. Easy to clean and use. Stack nicely. Good stuff, Maynard.
customer_reviews.author: Colin M. McConville

customer_reviews.title: No stick whatsoever!
customer_reviews.text: These work amazingly! No stick whatsoever; so much easier to make bread loafs without any crumbling or cracking!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent large loaf pans
customer_reviews.text: I bake all the time and my previous loaf pans were starting to lose their teflon coating. I bought these and was surprised to see that they were larger than my 'standard sized' loaf pans. They are perfect for meatloaf, loaves of bread, banana bread, etc. They have nice handles on the end and they stack together well. All in all, great pans, will buy again if I need more!
customer_reviews.author: Just My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Good pan for baking
customer_reviews.text: Good pan for baking it is just the right size, easy to use & clean.
customer_reviews.author: GPolanco

customer_reviews.title: Best bakeware hands down
customer_reviews.text: If you want great bakeware this is what you want. Does not bend under heat. Dark coating gives all baked goods nice color. Has a great non-stick coating. It's what the pro's use. I love Chicago Metallic. I would buy again if I ever need to.
customer_reviews.author: Maggiedoodle

customer_reviews.title: Farberware 9X5 Nonstick loaf pan
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pan, nonstick and very sturdy with a nice finish. No spray or butter required before use. I make banana bread from scratch and they came out great. I bought two of these and like to make two breads at the same time. Very pleased and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: USAF Vet

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, I have followed the directions about cleaning same ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because one meat loaf pan wasn't enough. I am now cooking two loafs at a time since one only feeds me for about three meals. So far so good, I have followed the directions about cleaning same day and not letting it soak over night. I also haven't put it in the dishwasher since some other reviews said that could cause the coating to flake.
customer_reviews.author: R. Chang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. I use them for making sandwich bread and they work amazingly. I grease them before using them, but even in the corners that the butter doesn't really get, it doesn't stick. Stop looking and buy these ones!
customer_reviews.author: Noelia G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love these baking pans. They are completely perfect in every way sturdy easy to clean and durable
customer_reviews.author: R. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with the heft and quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed by the quality of this pan, it's very sturdy, not flimsy at all, and had a very good nonstick coating. The pan cleans up well and, so far, no signs of the nonstick coating wearing or deteriorating in any way. For the price, I would say this pan is a bargain--particularly compared to some of the cheesy pans I stupidly bought in the grocery store. Now if I just had the ambition to bake more :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wignall

customer_reviews.title: Really nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nonstick- really nice quality- love the density- cooks very even- used them at the holidays. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra J Fortney

customer_reviews.title: Good quality nonstick bakeware
customer_reviews.text: I sent these to my grown son who cooks a lot. He said these pans are very sturdy and worked great in the oven. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Suz

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bread falls out without oiling the pans at all, much heavier than I expected for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These are the best baking pans I have ever had!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: My kids love making bread
customer_reviews.text: I am wishing I ordered more than 2. My kids love making bread. They been on a kick we do it every weekend. This past weekend we make 4 loaves. 2 with this pan and the other 2 were round loaves. This pan will get a lot of use and love. I can't wait to make some cakes with it too. I will be ordering more of these as soon as I can.
customer_reviews.author: Bluegirlrosereviews

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Great for bread, cakes, and meatloaf. I love these pans.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon R Sallee

customer_reviews.title: Great basic loaf pans!
customer_reviews.text: These are really great metal loaf pans. I used them to bake banana bread for my co workers and it turned out very well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pans
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality. Have used for cakes and breads with no issues
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Brown

customer_reviews.title: Continuing quality through the ages.
customer_reviews.text: Love they fit inside my other bakeware items from Farberware. Very helpful for efficient storage.
customer_reviews.author: Pam and Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Nice loaf pans
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pans. I love the weight of them. So far have not tried any yeast breads, but cooks everything else evenly. Just need to adjust cooking times, since is a 5in loaf, and previously I have used the 4in loaf. I have not had them very long, but I suspect the nonstick lining will continue to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: KRISTEN LAWRENCE

customer_reviews.title: Great loaf pan
customer_reviews.text: I love this pan. It has a non stick coating that is easy to hand wash, and my breads and loaves slide easily out of it after baking.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Best Pans Yet
customer_reviews.text: These pans are marvelous! I have baked bread in them many times and they just wipe clean. There is no sticking at all. The instructions that come with them say to not use spray on them and I have not. The bread just falls right out. I am so amazed. The pans are heavy and produce a nice brown crust. I really recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Great pans
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. The coating works well and they're easy to clean. Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made loaf pan! Does not rust and cooks very evenly! Would purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Bannert

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These loaf pans are great. I made Zucchini bread and it came our good. The bread didn’t stick to the sides or bottom. They are much cheaper than Bed bath nd beyond.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Peter

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Great item. I would purchase them all over again if and when I need them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Book

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for baking! I commend this product for its sturdiness and high quality and very easy to clean. Try it and you’ll never regret it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: QueenX

customer_reviews.title: Bakes well
customer_reviews.text: Bakes well and clean up is easy. Good size too.
customer_reviews.author: cjvegas

customer_reviews.title: More than meets my expectations very good baking vessel
customer_reviews.text: I bake bread weekly and I baked other items this pan performance wonderfully it is relatively non stick if I put parchment paper in it it doesn't even need clean up. I would buy this again and recommend it to others. Edit: I did purchase this again. : )
customer_reviews.author: Thawyzard

customer_reviews.title: Good, heavy pans
customer_reviews.text: I make sourdough bread regularly (six to nine loaves a week) for family and friends. My pans were getting very worn but I did not realize how bad they were until I got these. I use very little Crisco to grease them and bread comes out beautifully. I wash them by hand but think you can probably put them in the dishwasher. The price is great compared to store prices I checked and pans are much nicer. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sue E

customer_reviews.title: good pan
customer_reviews.text: it does what it supposed to the bread doesn't stick to it and its easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Mike W.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bread pans! I needed some and am happy with my purchase. They’re easy to clean and baked evenly. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these baking pans
customer_reviews.text: I love these baking pans! I bake sourdough bread often, and these pans are the perfect size for a beautiful loaf of bread. They are heavier than some pans, which makes them better quality, in my opinion. They also clean up easily. Great pans for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Amberly

customer_reviews.title: Great pans. My one was dented and missing some ...
customer_reviews.text: Great pans. My one was dented and missing some of the nonstick coating on the outside but I kept it as it didn't affect the inside of the pan. My bread came right out with no problem. Would have been five stars had it not been dented.
customer_reviews.author: Panysgirl

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality material and coating. I use them for cakes all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. know itall

customer_reviews.title: Great Pan!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this pan once but I am very happy with my purchase. They are durable and so easy to clean! very happy with my purchase! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HockeyMom

customer_reviews.title: Scratches for no reason
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about this pan and couldn't wait to bake some banana nut bread in it! But I was disappointed, because for some reason it has scratches in several spots on the inside. Some of the silver coating came off on my bread. I have no idea why or how it happened.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great Nonstick Pan
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and I love them! I bake meatloaf and bread and basically everything I can think of in these pans. I make supper for two people so these are the perfect size. And I can wash them with my dishrag and don't have to scrub and scrub to get them clean. Defiantly nonstick and I will be buying more of Faberware Bakeware. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: JessR122

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bakeware
customer_reviews.text: Great quality pan that has proven to bake banana bread evenly, browned on all sides and very easy removal. I believe it is an almost perfect loaf baking pan. Cleans without effort. This is my first Farberware baking pan and I am inclined to replace many of my other baking pans with a Farberware item. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ann c. maclean

customer_reviews.title: You should buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I just used , very easy , and did the job.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pans!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are great! Heavy-duty construction makes for consistent bakes. No sticking and easy clean up. Also, the pans store and wear well. So glad I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: NoNiffer

customer_reviews.title: Good pans
customer_reviews.text: Used to make keto banana bread. Bread came out wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: HealthyWealthyBeautiful

customer_reviews.title: Non stick and right size
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this product. Easy to clean because it's non stick. Despite the price its held up to my more expensive cookware standards.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: Really doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: Great pan for bread baking; requires no grease. Bread pulls away from the edge just a bit and comes out clean as a whistle.
customer_reviews.author: RobinRedbird

customer_reviews.title: Great pans for baking breads!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how sturdy these pans were for such a low price! But man they are perfect for baking breads! Breads just come right out without sticking even a little!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Coulter

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for my toddler to use as a toy. I bought as an add-on just to use up a gift card. My son enjoys banging on it and putting toys in it. Definitely recommend for mud pies, grass loafs, or whatever your creative mind thinks of.
customer_reviews.author: B Town

customer_reviews.title: These are really nice bread pans
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice bread pans. After using a few times and tossing in the dishwasher, they don't seem to be getting that brown greasy looking buildup that my other bread pans and cookie sheets always have.
customer_reviews.author: LynnD

customer_reviews.title: Great pans for baking!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bread pans for baking my favorite, Banana Nut Bread!
customer_reviews.author: Athena Love

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy pans. They appear to be much better than my old beat up aluminum ones!
customer_reviews.author: kehiju

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! I make bread everyday and these still ...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I make bread everyday and these still look great after a year of use! Just make sure to follow cleaning instructions...wash and dry by hand. Never in the dishwasher. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: MommaLove

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: Cleans thoroughly and quickly. Use it several times/week and it’s holding up well
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy pan, makes good loaves, easy bake, cleaning is really a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: ROYALTY

customer_reviews.title: Great pan
customer_reviews.text: Best banana bread I've ever made thanks to this pan!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Maguire

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I mean, it's a pan, no more no less. Does exactly what you would expect a pan to do.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bolovschak

customer_reviews.title: Better than all those more expensive loaf pans! LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a loaf pan made by another manufacturer and it was terrible! So glad I went back to this one! My Banana Bread and my Spiced Apple Cinnamon Bread baked perfectly and slid out of the pan easily. And the price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: doggie mom

product_meta.title: Farberware Bakeware Meatloaf/Nonstick Baking Loaf Pan Set, Two 9-Inch x 5-Inch, Gray
product_meta.description: Size:Two 9-Inch x 5-Inch Loaf PansCreate homemade cakes, quick breads and more in the Farberware Nonstick Bakeware 2-Piece Bread and Meat Loaf Pan Set. Farberware has provided more than a century of reliability, value, and performance to generations of home bakers, and upholds that tradition with every piece of sturdy and dependable bakeware. Use these nonstick loaf pans for a delicious meatloaf dinner during the week and make a second one for keeping and freezing. The loaf pans are perfect for pound cakes, wonderful for walnut breads, delicious for breads, and more. Boasting heavy-duty construction, the durable baking pans resist warping and heat evenly to brown beautifully and help reduce hot spots that can burn baked goods. Nonstick inside and out delivers great food release with quick cleanup. Oven safe to 450°F, these loaf pans make an ideal addition to bakeware sets and pans, fluted molds, and other specialty baking pieces in the Farberware Bakeware collection. Enjoy the aroma of freshly baked quick breads and savory foods baked at home using the Farberware Nonstick Bakeware 2-Piece Loaf Pan Set.
feature_bullets: Heavy duty steel rolled-rim bake ware construction provides years of long lasting, warp resistant baking performance
Nonstick coating inside and out provides beautiful baking and browning with easy cleanup
